properties.title: DPML Component Management Solutions
properties.description: Intelligent Component Management Solutions for Java.
properties.keywords: DPML, build, runtime, management, components, soa, java, composition

section.name: Unknown Resource Reference (404)
section.p: The requested page is unknown. Chances are that you have referenced a resource relative to an interim or milestone version ID. Javadoc API are available for all formal releases and several dependent libraries. The menu on the right details all of the available Javadoc API groups hosted by the DPML. By navigating though group and published versions you should be able to find the APIs you need. If the resources your looking for at not listed please notify the DPML via the support mailing list.
